name: Blaze Accelerator Reserve
text: Can be used by sending 1 or 2 "Volcanic" monster(s) from your hand to your Graveyard. Choose "Blaze Accelerator" card(s) from your Deck or Graveyard equal to the number of cards you sent from your hand to the Graveyard, and add them to your hand. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
